item.description:
2 hr. 40 min. | R - some strong violence and brief sexual references

Cast: Brad Pitt, Casey Affleck, Sam Shepard, Mary-Louise Parker, Paul Schneider

Director: Andrew Dominik

Genre: Western, Psychological Western

Description: While the infamous and unpredictable outlaw (Brad Pitt) plans his next big heist, he launches pre-emptive strikes against those seeking to collect the reward money on his head. However, the most deadly threat to James may come from those closest to him. Based on the book by Ron Hansen.

Review: http://www.boston.com...

Trailer: http://www.apple.com/...

Notes: Please do not rsvp yes if you do not intend to come. Please buy your tix AHEAD of time! I'm going to watch this regardless of people coming, but it's "funner" with people.

The film starts @7PM in an auditorium upstairs on the 2nd level. I'll fold a red meetup sign on a table, if I can grab one. Otherwise, I might have to hold it up like a chauffer awaiting VIP guests for a limousine =P. I'll be entering the auditorium @6:45PM to get good seats.

After the film ends, I'll be waiting near the very first row of the big screen with a red Meetup sign. The group often goes out afterwards and socialize.

PS yes, we are featuring casey affleck this month ;). we all know you luv Boston-bred actors.
item.name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
